institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training business operation rules/Article 41 (Objections to accounting settlement results)
contents: Article 41 (Objection to Accounting Settlement Results) ① If the business group has an objection to the accounting settlement results, it may file an objection to the person performing the accounting settlement by attaching explanatory materials within 7 days from the date of being notified of the results. , ② If the Chairman of the Board deems that the objections, explanatory materials, opinions of the person performing the accounting settlement, etc. in Paragraph 1 have substantial grounds, they may be reflected in the accounting settlement results.
